subsystem.description: The subsystem that needs to be controller

activate.description: This method allows a subsystem to be activated from the outside. This is usefull in case Thunder can not determine the availability of a subsystem but it needs to be triggered from the outside.

configuration.description: A JSON string that holds the information applicable to the subsystem to be activated

result.description: The result of the activating anythin unequal to 0 means somthing failed

deactivate.description: This method allows a subsystem to be deactivated from the outside. This is usefull in case Thunder can not determine the availability of a subsystem but it needs to be triggered from the outside.
